# Teacherplot

The goal of teacherplot is to provide some plots teacher may like if
they are into teaching statistics and realted fields.

## Installation

You can install the development version of teacherplot like so:

library(devtools) devtools::install_github(“sebastiansauer/teacherplot”)

# Package index

## All functions

- [`binomial_plot()`](https://sebastiansauer.github.io/teacherplot/reference/binomial_plot.md)
  : Binomial plot
- [`exp_plot()`](https://sebastiansauer.github.io/teacherplot/reference/exp_plot.md)
  : Exponential distribution plot
- [`get_norm_density()`](https://sebastiansauer.github.io/teacherplot/reference/get_norm_density.md)
  : Get normal densities, shifted and scaled
- [`hello()`](https://sebastiansauer.github.io/teacherplot/reference/hello.md)
  : Hello, World!
- [`shaded_normal_plot()`](https://sebastiansauer.github.io/teacherplot/reference/shaded_normal_plot.md)
  : Plot shaded normal
- [`uniform_plot()`](https://sebastiansauer.github.io/teacherplot/reference/uniform_plot.md)
  : Uniform plot
